backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a café billing backend with persistent menu item CRUD operations, category-grouped menu queries, order finalization with tax calculation, and sales reporting (daily summary, item-wise, date-wise).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a fix for menu data failing to load on the Menu Management screen, listing the affected frontend files and test ID REQ-13.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, describing their purpose, styling, and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, primary, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'Café Billing & Menu Manager' and mounting the app via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with routes for /menu, /order, /bill, and /reports under a root AppLayout, with an index redirect to /menu.
frontend/src/components/bill/BillItemsTa: Renders a receipt-style table of order items showing name, quantity, unit price, and line total using the formatCurrency utility.
Print-optimized receipt component displaying the café logo, order date/time, items table via BillItemsTable, and a totals breakdown including tax and optional discount.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component with a sticky header showing the café logo and name, a scrollable main content outlet, and conditional bottom Navigation hidden on the bill page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Fixed bottom tab bar with Menu, Order, and Reports links, highlighting the active tab with icon weight and background changes.
frontend/src/components/menu/DeleteMenuI: AlertDialog confirmation component for deleting a menu item, showing the item name and a loading state on the destructive confirm button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Renders a grouped list of menu items under a category header, with inline edit (dialog) and delete actions for each item.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemFor: Reusable form for creating or editing a menu item with name, price, and category fields (preset or custom), including validation.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuCatego: Collapsible accordion component that groups and displays menu items by category during order creation.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuItemCa: Card component displaying a single menu item's name and price with an add button and current order quantity badge.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderItemR: Row component for an active order item showing quantity controls, line total, and a remove button.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderSumma: Scrollable panel listing all active order items using OrderItemRow, with an empty-state placeholder when no items are added.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderTotal: Displays order subtotal, editable tax rate, flat or percentage discount controls, and the final total.
frontend/src/components/reports/DailySum: Shows three stat cards for today's revenue, items sold, and tax collected, with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateRang: Two date inputs with an apply button for filtering reports by a start and end date range.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateWise: Table that groups orders by day and displays date, order count, and total revenue for a given date range.
frontend/src/components/reports/ItemWise: Renders a table card showing item-wise sales data (name, quantity, revenue) with loading skeleton and empty state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and an InternetIdentityProvider component, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderState.ts: Custom hook managing active order state including items, tax rate, discount (flat or percentage), and computed totals (subtotal, tax, discount, total).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions: menu CRUD operations, order finalization, and sales report queries (daily summary, item-wise, date-wise history).
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a warm café-themed design system with OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark modes, typography, scrollbar styling, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class name merging, currency formatting (number and bigint), date/datetime formatting from ICP nanosecond timestamps, and date range helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillView.tsx: Displays a finalized bill by reading bill data from sessionStorage, rendering it via BillLayout, and providing Print and New Order actions. Handles missing bill data with an empty state and uses a custom BigInt-aware JSON parser.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagement.tsx: Menu management page that lists menu items grouped by category with add, edit, and delete functionality using React Query mutations. Shows loading skeletons, error states, and a dialog form for creating new items.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTaking.tsx: Order-taking page that displays the menu by category, lets staff add/adjust items, configure tax and discount, and finalize the order by saving bill data to sessionStorage and navigating to the bill view.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReports.tsx: Sales reports page with a daily summary card and tabbed views for item-wise and date-wise sales history, supporting a date range filter applied to the date-wise query.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, café-themed colors (espresso, latte, cream), custom border radii, box shadows, font families, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata (version 15) describing the café billing app's features, architecture notes, known issues, and a pre-populated menu across 10 categories used to guide build planning.
